title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 60.1 - Sales prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 60.1 - Sales prohibited

State Regulations

No alcoholic beverages shall be sold, offered for sale or
given away upon any premises licensed to sell at retail during the hours
prohibited by law or by rule duly adopted by a local board pursuant to section
43 of the Alcoholic Beverage Control Law. (See Appendixes B-1 and B-2 of this

Title, for county closing hours.)

Notes

60.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
